name: Gin Rummy
shortDescription: A premium mobile Gin Rummy game offering multiple game modes, competitive leagues, and extensive customization options.
fullDescription:
Gin Rummy is a feature-rich mobile adaptation of the classic card game, set in a luxurious, casino-themed interface. Players can choose between three distinct game variations: Quick, Classic, and Oklahoma.

The game supports competitive play through a **'League'** system, tracked by Trophies, which can be protected using **'Trophy Protection'** boosters found in the 'Inventory'.

Key Features:

  • Multiple Game Modes: Play Quick, Classic, and Oklahoma Gin Rummy.
  • Competitive Play: Join competitive **'League'** systems and interact with other players in **'Clubs'**.
  • Dual Currency: Utilize Gold Chips (for entry fees/wins) and Diamonds.
  • Customization: Extensive Inventory system for unlocking **'Card Backs'**, **'Cosmetics'**, and helpful **'Consumables'** like 'Double XP' boosters.
  • Social Features: Includes features for managing **'Friends'** and tracking **'Mission'** goals.
